channel.title: How do i change Welcome to PimpScape Pk Server in the main menu
channel.description: ok basically i need to know how i can change what the main menu thing says i want it to say Welcome To Jubbyscape Pk server and i don't really care about the rest of the stuff but plz help methere is no tuts on this

item.title: How do i change Welcome to PimpScape Pk Server in the main menu
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

First go to Client.java and look for the first line of the intro screen eg Welcome to PimpScape

You should see something like this:
this is from my server btw

sendQuest("@dre@Main Menu", 8144); //Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@dbl@Welcome to DutchScape Server", 8145); sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@~~~@dbl@", 8147); sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@ NO FUCKIN 0 ITEMIN OR MASS CLICKING OR BANZ0RZ!", 8148); sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@ for commands type ::commands",8150); sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@ IMPORTANT!!!!",8151); sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@ DO NOT USE ::CAT ::NOCLIP OR ::SETITEM, IT BANNS YOU.",8152); sendQuest("@dre@You last logged in from @blu@"+IPPart1+"."+IPPart2+"."+IPPart3+"."+IPPart4+" @gre@ "+GetLastLogin(lastlogintime)+" @dre@ days ago.@dbl@", 8154); sendQuest("@dre@Players online: @gre@"+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(), 8155); sendQuest("@blu@===Your pk stats===", 8156); sendQuest("@red@Total Kills - "+killcount, 8157); sendQuest("@red@Pk Points - "+pkpoints, 8158); sendQuest("@red@Death Count - "+deathcount, 8159); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }

This is the intro screen,as you see, the parts behind sendQuest are the stuff you see in the screen, you can just edit this.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change Welcome to PimpScape Pk Server in the main menu
